name: Elementium (itch)
description:
Run, Jump, and Fight through a challenging 3D environment as you search for various elemental powerups scattered throughout. Once obtained these powerups will allow you to swap your current elemental form, gaining new movement and combat abilities. Beware of enemies as you collect all the powerups and make your way to the end of the level!

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Wall Jump - Space (Slime Form)

Double Jump - Space (Air Form)

Shoot - Left Click (Fire Form)

Aim - Right Click (Fire Form)

Dash - Left Shift (Fire Form)
